jobs.title: Dog-Sitter Needed for Weekends
jobs.description: Sophie is looking for a dog-sitter to care for her two dogs during weekends. Duties include feeding, walking, and some playtime.

jobs.title: Pet-Sitting for Two Cats
jobs.description: Mike is going on vacation and needs someone to care for his two cats. Responsibilities include feeding, cleaning the litter box, and occasional playtime.

jobs.title: Dog Walker Needed - Weekday Afternoons
jobs.description: Alex is looking for someone to walk his medium-sized dog on weekday afternoons. The walks should be about 45 minutes long, and the dog is friendly with people and other pets.

jobs.title: Pet Sitting for Small Animals (Hamster and Rabbit)
jobs.description: Grace needs someone to care for her hamster and rabbit while she's out of town. Duties include feeding, changing bedding, and keeping the animals entertained.

jobs.title: Overnight Pet-Sitting for One Dog
jobs.description: Jamie is looking for an overnight pet-sitter for his older dog, who needs companionship and regular potty breaks. The dog is well-behaved but requires medication in the morning and evening.

jobs.title: Dog Grooming Assistant
jobs.description: Carla needs assistance with grooming her large dog. Duties include bathing, brushing, and trimming nails. Experience with grooming tools is a plus, but not required.

jobs.title: Weekend Pet Sitter for Three Cats
jobs.description: Ryan is looking for a reliable pet-sitter to care for his three cats over the weekend. Responsibilities include feeding, cleaning the litter boxes, and spending some playtime with the cats.

jobs.title: Doggie Daycare Helper
jobs.description: Megan runs a small doggie daycare out of her home and needs a helper to care for multiple dogs during the day. Duties include feeding, cleaning, and playing with the dogs.

jobs.title: Dog Walking and Training Support
jobs.description: Oliver is seeking a dog walker who also has experience with basic dog training commands. His dog is high-energy and in need of regular exercise and behavioral training reinforcement during walks.

jobs.title: Fish Tank Maintenance Specialist
jobs.description: Emily needs help maintaining her large saltwater fish tank. Responsibilities include cleaning the tank, checking water quality, and feeding the fish. Prior experience with fish tank maintenance is preferred.

jobs.title: Evening Babysitter for Two Kids
jobs.description: Sarah is looking for a babysitter for her two young kids. The job involves evening care, light meal prep, and putting them to bed.

jobs.title: After-School Childcare
jobs.description: Emma is seeking after-school care for her three children. Responsibilities include helping with homework, preparing snacks, and light housekeeping.

jobs.title: Part-Time Evening Babysitter
jobs.description: Jessica needs a part-time babysitter for her 5-year-old daughter. The job involves supervising her for 2-3 hours in the evenings and assisting with bedtime routines.

jobs.title: Weekend Nanny Needed
jobs.description: Matthew is seeking a weekend nanny for his two children, ages 4 and 7. Duties include planning activities, preparing meals, and providing supervision.

jobs.title: After-School Sitter for Two Kids
jobs.description: Olivia needs an after-school sitter for her two kids, ages 6 and 9. The job includes helping with homework, providing snacks, and supervising playtime.

jobs.title: Mother's Helper for Infant
jobs.description: Laura is looking for a mother's helper to assist her with caring for her newborn. Duties include feeding, diaper changes, and light housekeeping.

jobs.title: Full-Time Nanny for Toddler
jobs.description: Chris is looking for a full-time nanny to care for his 2-year-old son. Responsibilities include organizing activities, preparing meals, and taking the toddler to the park.

jobs.title: Babysitter for Date Nights
jobs.description: Emma is seeking a reliable babysitter for occasional date nights. Care is needed for her 3-year-old and 7-year-old children. The job involves feeding, playing, and putting them to bed.

jobs.title: Overnight Nanny for Infant
jobs.description: Sophia is in need of an overnight nanny to care for her newborn. Duties include feeding, diaper changes, and monitoring the baby throughout the night.

jobs.title: Temporary Babysitter for School Break
jobs.description: Ryan is looking for a temporary babysitter during the school break for his 6-year-old twins. The sitter will engage them in educational activities and take them on local outings.

jobs.title: Lawn Mowing and Hedge Trimming
jobs.description: John is seeking help with mowing the lawn and trimming hedges in his backyard. Must be familiar with lawn care equipment.

jobs.title: Garden Maintenance and Weeding
jobs.description: Mary needs assistance maintaining her garden, primarily weeding and pruning flowers.

jobs.title: Lawn Mowing and Edging
jobs.description: Michael needs someone to mow and edge his lawn every two weeks. Equipment provided, but experience with lawn care tools is preferred.

jobs.title: Garden Weeding and Mulching
jobs.description: Samantha is looking for help with weeding her flower beds and applying mulch. This is a one-time job, with potential for future projects.

jobs.title: Tree Trimming and Pruning
jobs.description: John needs someone to trim and prune the trees in his backyard. Experience with tree care is required. Must bring your own tools.

jobs.title: Seasonal Leaf Raking
jobs.description: Sarah is looking for someone to rake and bag leaves in her yard during the fall season. Equipment will be provided.
